wikipedia_page.main: Evelyn Sandberg-Vavalà (1888 -1961) also known as Evelyn May Graham Sandberg or Evelyn Kendrew was an art historian who studied iconography in the Italian Renaissance. She published a book on Italian Painted Crucifixes and the Iconography of the Passion in 1929, and curated her 25,000 image photographic archive of gothic and renaissance Italian paintings, now in Fondazione Giorgio Cini, Venice.
